title: Beachside Glamour in the Greek Islands
description: Uncover the secrets of the locals' favourite Greek island of Andros at the beachfront Aegea Blue Cycladic Resort. Nestled on a hilltop, this exclusive property offers spectacular views over the Aegean Sea. Includes daily buffet breakfast, nightly three-course Mediterranean dinners, a three-course ‘Flavours of Greece’ lunch, return ferry port transfers, welcome drinks and more.
offer_address: Zorgos Beach, Andros Island, Cyclades 845 01, Greece
